title: SOLD - High-Grade 1909 Ramly (T204) - Tim Murnane HOF Rookie Card (SGC 60)
author: Archive

posts.post_title: SOLD - High-Grade 1909 Ramly (T204) - Tim Murnane HOF Rookie Card (SGC 60)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Phil Garry
Good Evening, Collectors:

Up for sale tonight is a vert tough to find Hall of Fame Rookie Card of noted baseball journalist, Tim Murnane. This beauty is the 1909 Ramly T204 - Tim Murnane graded an SGC 60 by the strict graders at Sportscard Guaranty Company, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review large scans of the front and back of the card for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $550.00 dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: vguerrerobb@yahoo.com.


[IMG]http://i150.photobucket.com/albums/s120/bcbgcbrcb/TMurnane.jpg[/IMG]
